1.title: Tommy
1.plot: Five young offenders and their friend (tommy) are saved from an steroid impact on earth by taking a secret rail to a lonely island deep within the ocean, after a prophecy of a man who would bombard the asteroid and save humanity fails to come true.

imdb.plot outline: An Israeli tv show about 6 kids who discover one day, under an asteroid attack on earth that kills everything but them what their true destiny is- to save the world. Together they go through an amazing ride that includes supernatural powers, time travel, teleportation, joined enemies, hope and love. A highly popular tv show among the Israeli population.
imdb.title: The Island
plot: An Israeli tv show about 6 kids who discover one day, under an asteroid attack on earth that kills everything but them what their true destiny is- to save the world. Together they go through an amazing ride that includes supernatural powers, time travel, teleportation, joined enemies, hope and love. A highly popular tv show among the Israeli population.::yuval levy
